text: api for sending email with website in HubSpot

Hello Team
i want to sending email with my website using HubSpot ?  can you  anyone help me

Hello <@U048C858Y94>,

Can you try below option to change the width of Email Template. But, It's effect Globally in all templates.

Go to--> settings -->Tools -->Marketing --> Emails --> Branding(classic Editor). then change the Width of email.
Yeah, that wouldn't fly unfortunately. Client has a ton of templates already that would be affected.
